ud1.8:1.2: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.
ud1.8:1.3: Now at that time around Venerable Saṅgāmaji had arrived at Sāvatthī to see the Buddha.
ud1.8:1.6: and went to the Jetavana, taking their boy.
ud1.8:2.1: Now at that time Venerable Saṅgāmaji was sitting at the root of a tree for the day’s meditation.
ud1.8:2.2: Then his former wife went up to him and said,
ud1.8:2.3: “Provide for me, ascetic, for I have a little child.”
ud1.8:2.4: When she said this, Saṅgāmaji kept silent.
ud1.8:3.1: For a second time she said,
ud1.8:3.2: “Provide for me, ascetic, for I have a little child.”
